settings: {"color.categorical_palette":["#1b9e77","#d95f02","#7570b3","#e7298a","#66a61e","#e6ab02","#a6761d","#666666"],"hierarchy_layout":"sunburst","label_case":"allUpperCase","label_weight":"allNormal","layout.footer_note":"註：如使用政府或公營機構服務，均不可使用消費券","layout.header_logo_enabled":true,"layout.header_logo_height":4.5,"layout.header_logo_src":"https://i.imgur.com/IGfOlUB.png","layout.source_label":"數據來源：","layout.source_name":"政府統計處《2019/20年住戶開支統計調查》","layout.subtitle":"（點按項目可查看金額）","layout.title":"本港每人月均開支約10,700元，逾半可用消費券支付，包括日常必須的食品及交通開支","layout.title_size":"2","layout.title_space_above":"0","layout.title_styling":true,"layout.title_weight":"bold","number_formatter.advanced":true,"number_formatter.strip_separator":false,"number_formatter.suffix":"元","num_of_visible_levels":3,"sunburst_labelling":"auto","sunburst_outer_radius":100,"sunburst_show_zoomed_node_in_center":true}
